description_rule_type: C0 (Fundamental): Value must be in the closed interval [0,1] - typically used for fractions like albedo or emissivity
C0 (Fundamental): Value must be strictly greater than 0 (>0) - typically used for physical quantities like thickness or density
C0 (Fundamental): Value must be greater than or equal to 0 (>=0) - typically used for rates or capacities
C1 (Non-fundamental): Value must be within a bounded range [a,b] or (a,b] - based on physical assumptions
C1 (Non-fundamental): Value must be greater than or equal to a minimum value (>=a where a > 0) - based on physical assumptions
C2 (Complex): Parameters are required only when certain conditions are met
description_rule_name: Validates all site parameters are complete; runs site-by-site checks and conditional validations (STEBBS, RSL, storage)

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Parameters are required only when certain conditions are met
description_rule_name: All STEBBS parameters must be present and non-null when stebbsmethod=1

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Parameters are required only when certain conditions are met
description_rule_name: When rslmethod=2 and buildings present (bldgs.sfr > 0), faibldg parameter must be set

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Parameters are required only when certain conditions are met
description_rule_name: When DyOHM storage heat method enabled (storageheatmethod=6), required storage parameters must be set

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Parameters are required only when certain conditions are met
description_rule_name: Critical physics parameters must be non-null (prevents runtime crashes from int() conversion)

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Parameters are required only when certain conditions are met
description_rule_name: Critical site fields (lat, lng, alt, timezone) must be present and valid; includes z0m_in < zdm_in physical constraint

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Single field validators that transform or validate field format before storage
description_rule_name: Validates output groups against allowed set: {SUEWS, DailyState, snow, ESTM, RSL, BL, debug, SPARTACUS, EHC, STEBBS}

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Single field validators that transform or validate field format before storage
description_rule_name: Converts numpy float/int types to Python native float/int for tstep and diagnose

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Single field validators that transform or validate field format before storage
description_rule_name: Converts numeric timezone offset values to TimezoneOffset enum

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Single field validators that transform or validate field format before storage
description_rule_name: Ensures temperature is properly formatted as 5-element array for multi-layer surfaces

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Single field validators that transform or validate field format before storage
description_rule_name: Validates working_day and holiday schedule format before parsing

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Validation rules that check relationships or consistency between multiple parameters
description_rule_name: Validates configuration schema version is compatible with current SUEWS version

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Validation rules that check relationships or consistency between multiple parameters
description_rule_name: Warns if netradiationmethod=1 (needs observed Ldown) but forcing file appears to be sample data

description_rule_type: C2 (Complex): Validation rules enforcing physical constraints between related parameters
description_rule_name: Output frequency must be positive and a multiple of timestep
